content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision in a legal case regarding the division of assets among three heirs the court determined that the deceased persons estate includes unpaid pension benefits funds in personal bank accounts a cash savings deposit and units in a subfund originally each heir was entitled to inherit 13 of the assets but an adjusted agreement was made heir 1 will receive 12 of the unpaid pension funds and funds in personal bank accounts as well as the cash savings deposit heir 2 will receive the units in the subfund heir 3 will also receive 12 of the unpaid pension funds and funds in personal bank accounts as well as the cash savings deposit the courts decision was based on the inheritance act and an agreement between the parties the court also determined that it had jurisdiction over the inheritance case based on the deceaseds habitual residence in slovenia the court received a written declaration approving the succession settlement and assessed the court fees to be paid by the heirs the text also explains the process of appealing a decision including the time limit requirements and consequences of lodging an appeal

metadata.subject_of_succession: unpaid pension benefits, funds on personal bank account, cash on savings deposit, units in a sub-fund
